front.title: A YANG Data Model for L1 Connectivity Service Model (L1CSM)

abstract.t: This document provides a YANG data model for Layer 1 Connectivity Service Model (L1CSM). The intent of this document is to provide a transport service model exploiting YANG data model, which can be utilized by a client network controller to initiate a service request connectivity request as well as retrieving service states toward a transport network controller communicating with the client controller. This YANG model is NMDA-compliant.
